name: popularization
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
[ U ] the act or process of becoming popular or making something become popular: With the popularization of blogging, information overload is worse than ever.
[ C or U ] the act of making something known and understood by ordinary people: Popularization of science is seen as the process of transmitting real science to the layperson.
More examplesFewer examplesShe wrote a history of the popularization of Chinese food in the USA.Internet cafes have contributed significantly to the popularization of the internet.The show was an exemplar of the popularization of cooking good food at home for friends.The organization involves itself in telescope making, organizing observation sessions for the public and popularization of astronomy. The 1918 popularization of his Theory of Relativity was written once he was no longer under intense pressure to prove himself.
